EmailTemplate.name: Missing Letter of Certification
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI Coolers. I have reviewed your documents and they look great. We are just missing a copy of the Letter of Certification. I have attached a copy of the document for easy access. You can reply to this email with your document.
I look forward to working with you.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384
customerservice@yeti.com
